name: Slot Machine (Carles González)
description:
Slot Machine About the game: This is a slot machine in its most basic version, the principle is simple: 

When button "SPIN" is pressed it starts to turn from left to right, the rotation time it's random each spin, between two and four seconds, when this time is up the machine starts to stop again from left to right.  At this point, if there is some winning patron, points are added to your score. 

How to win score:

You win points if there are specific types of matches (patrons) between the same figure, depending of the matched figure and the type of match, you recieve more or less points.

There are two tipes of winning patrons:

Basic patrons:

If there is the same figure minimum three times in a row, starting from the left, you win points, the score is different depending of the number of repetitons (three, four or five).  

Special patrons:

Not only with rows is how you gain points, furthermore, there are special patrons that will give you more points than the basic ones.
